newsitem.title: USA: MedicalControl unit to form joint venture.
newsitem.headline: MedicalControl unit to form joint venture.

text.p: MedicalControl Inc said Friday its wholly-owned Diversified Group Administrators Inc unit has formed a joint venture with Initial Group Inc.

MedicalControl, a managed healthcare company, said the venture, called East Tennessee Administrative Services, will provide services for insured risk taking and employer funded benefit programs in eastern Tennessee.
Services will include claims administration, risk assessment, plan design, regulation compliance, marketing activities, auxiliary products and other services.
Initial Group is owned by St. Mary's Health System Inc and the Baptist Health Systems of East Tennessee.
